settings_forecastPlot_params.description: Basic decomposition models are:  1. Additive: x[t] = Trend + Seasonal + Random, 2. Multiplicative:  x[t] = Trend * Seasonal * Random. Hybrid models are allowed. Any forbiden model combination will be replaced by `Automatic`

forecastLength.description: Maximal number of data points to predict

freq1.description: Number of data points in smaller season period. For example, for time series with 15 minutes interval and daily seasonality the value is 96.

freq2.description: Number of data points in larger season period. For example, for time series with 15 minutes interval and weekly seasonality the value is 672.

refPointShift.description: Value in hours used to shift reported period, for example: 4 if nominal day starts at 4 am, or 24 if nominal week starts at Monday

textSize.description: Font size used to show information

numDigitsInfo.description: Number of digits to the right of the decimal point

whichInfo.description: Select one of the items: information criterion (AIC), cumulative forecast value (actual + predicted), or TBATS method

cranPackages.name: zoo
cranPackages.displayName: zoo: S3 Infrastructure for Regular and Irregular Time Series

cranPackages.name: reshape2
cranPackages.displayName: reshape2: Flexibly Reshape Data: A Reboot of the Reshape Package

cranPackages.name: forecast
cranPackages.displayName: forecast: Forecasting Functions for Time Series and Linear Models

cranPackages.name: lubridate
cranPackages.displayName: lubridate: Make Dealing with Dates a Little Easier
